title: 848 66 "Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!"Transliteration: "Sanī o Mamore Funsen Choppā ando Burukku" (Japanese:サニーを守れ 奮戦！チョッパー&ブルック) Hiroyuki Satō Tomohiro Nakayama August 5, 2018(2018-08-05)
transformers_text:
848 66 "Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!"Transliteration: "Sanī o Mamore Funsen Choppā ando Burukku" (Japanese:サニーを守れ 奮戦！チョッパー&ブルック) Hiroyuki Satō Tomohiro Nakayama August 5, 2018(2018-08-05)

After Sanji successfully got on Rabiyan, Pudding helps Luffy's group by preventing the tree homies from hindering them any longer. Sanji, Pudding, and Chiffon then leave Whole Cake Island and head for Cacao Island. Chopper and Brook continue fighting the Big Mom Pirates on the Thousand Sunny. Perospero steps in and subdues them, trapping them in candy. Shortly afterwards, Luffy's group reaches the coast.
